top_comments.comment: I love how Claudio just didn’t say anything and complemented the soup when it poured on him.

"This dish is like my grandpa on a plate"
Me who is confused, "Ok.... Nice dish..... Good cooking... umm...."

I love Claudio's reaction at having food thrown on him xD

Any person's reaction : "You clumsy moron, look at what you've done you donut!!!" 
Claudio's reaction : *YUM!* xD
LOVING how active the channel has become the past fortnight or so!
Chef Reid and Chef Alexander in the building 🔥🇯🇲💯👈👈💯

comments_since_last_sample.body: I wish the last season is included here
